item.description: Are you obligated to attend an event just because you received a save-the-date card before another invitation? What are your responsibilities when hosting a children’s play date? Should you give teachers holiday and end of year gifts? Wonder no more! Etiquette consultant Jodi R. R. Smith comes to the rescue with the ABCs of minding your manners. In her new "The Etiquette Book." Ms. Smith will read selected passages from the chapters “Charm for Children” and “Better Behaviors for Tweens & Teens” and answer etiquette emergency questions from the group. If you wish to bring a book for Ms. Smith to sign, you can purchase The Etiquette Book at the Framingham Barnes & Noble for $27.95 or online for $19.12 at, http://tinyurl.com/3l.... To learn more about Ms. Smith and her work go to: www.Mannersmith.com.
item.name: Mothers & More Discussion: Manners for Minors
